abstract: Google introduced a mobile application that allows consumers to make a payment by waving their cellphones at a retailer’s terminal rather than pulling out a credit card.
snippet: Google introduced a mobile application that allows consumers to make a payment by waving their cellphones at a retailer’s terminal rather than pulling out a credit card.
lead_paragraph: Google is among the first out of the gate in the attempt to make leather wallets go the way of the typewriter.

headline.main: Google Unveils App for Paying With Phone
headline.print_headline: Google Unveils App For Paying With Phone
